about_the_game:
Welcome to Love and Demons! An unusual, parodic Isekai Visual Novel.



Ever felt like running away from your responsibilities? That's exactly what Max, a prince fleeing an inheritance forced upon him, is doing. However, his escape propels him into the demon realm, a highly hostile environment brimming with dangers. It seems it won't be easy to get back home without taking some risks.

Love and Demons is an explosively fantastical, pixel-art parodic isekai visual novel, where Max's luck and virtues will be put to the test. Lead him to salvation, challenge fate by rolling die, train Max by increasing his stats, and uncover the numerous secrets of this world. Make use of a wide array of choices and an intertwined story, avoid the numerous bad endings, and pave your way to the coveted good ending.

Max will have to write his own destiny and, above all, try to survive, but he won't do it alone; he'll be joined by new bizarre acquaintances who will accompany him on his adventure.

Max - The hero! Apparently...

Our first character is Max, the protagonist and the quintessential lazy prince, especially when it comes to royal responsibilities! Indeed, he never misses a chance to grab a good pint with some friends. His laziness and indifference have made him a magnet for problems. Lady Luck doesn't seem to be on his side, but he's doing his best to change her mind... Maybe...

Karen - Leaf her alone!

The demonic realm, as the name suggests, is chock-full of demons with a colorful array of behaviors. That's why Karen, who is also very shy, has some trouble relating to them and prefers the company of plants, which certainly don't have as "lively" of a personality as the other living beings of those lands. However, she's unexpectedly stubborn and resolute in her beliefs, so don't underestimate her!

Lilith - She's a real bombshell!

Among all types of demons, archdevils stand out as some of the most powerful, and Lilith is one of them. As the throne’s heir, she might seem haughty and distant, with her social skills certainly not helping much.. In reality, she loves to help those in need and can't stand to see someone in trouble. She just has one small flaw: she can't control her emotions well, so it's better to be careful about what you say around her, she might "explode" at any moment!

Aurelia - NOT Lilith

Sure, there are plenty of bizarre creatures, but Aurelia might just top them all. Before you even think it, no, she's not some kind of Lilith’s knock-off. And don't you dare say that to her face; she can be as nasty as she wants to be. But don't worry, you'll have enough time to dig through her snarky comments and her good-girl facade to see what lies beneath those tough layers, that is if you manage to survive the ordeal.


Here are the awesome features inside Love and Demons:

  • Look Max, one day all of this will be yours. Have fun discovering and exploring the world's variety and the beauty of its characters. Try every possible combination, but remember that each choice will affect the story's outcome and even lead you to different endings!
  • Secrets, Stats, and Lucky Rolls! Challenge fate with dice rolls that will influence your gameplay, train to enhance your stats, and find all the secrets hidden within this adventure!
  • Curves in all the right places! Enchanting pixel art will captivate you and transport you to the demonic realm with Max.
  • Beware! Every wall might contain a chicken. Mysteries, puzzles, but also truths, will lead you to discover the world from its roots, and you might even stumble upon some top-secret stories!
  • A demonic realm like you've never heard before. Let yourself be captivated by the engaging and pressing OSTs that will accompany you throughout the game.

Here is the plot:

Max is enjoying his usual beer with some friends at the tavern when, suddenly, he realizes that the guards are looking for him. He decides to flee, but luck is not on his side, as he finds himself accidentally thrown into the fearsome Demon Realm. Wandering in these unknown lands, he encounters three interesting girls. What will he do? Who are these girls? Will he manage to get back home?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains material not suitable for all ages or viewing at work or in public: suggestive poses, fantasy violence, fantasy drug use, alcohol use, and crude language.
